description: Reorganized creator sidebar navigation by moving Collections under Portfolio as 'Manage Collections' subnav item.
Added share button to collection view page for public collections, using the same share functionality as profile pages.
Creator sidebar now shows all subnav items at all times instead of only when parent is selected.
Introduced getCreatorUrl utility function to standardize creator URL generation across components, improving consistency and maintainability.
Added slug property to user data structures to support dynamic URL generation for creator profiles.
Added Discord integration script to automatically post changelog updates to Discord channels.
Enhanced breadcrumb navigation for creator-related pages with translation support, added Creators link to breadcrumb segments, and introduced new mobile navigation and sidebar components.
Simplified CollectionsPage interface by removing Pencil icon button for owners while retaining collection creation functionality.
Standardized creator-related URLs across the application, replacing profile and portfolio links with dynamic creator paths and implementing user slug support.
Removed outdated portfolio and profile routes, streamlining the codebase and consolidating all creator-related functionality under the creators path.
Refactored routing to standardize creator paths, replacing profile and portfolio links with creator-specific routes and implementing new breadcrumb navigation.
Created new creator pages for profiles, portfolios, collections, and submissions with comprehensive editing capabilities and OpenGraph image support.
Updated USERFLOW.md with enhanced sitemap diagram, improved page descriptions, and added legend for authentication requirements.
